name: group-assignment2-cinema-project
description: - Language used in commits: English. - Be as clear as possible in commits and names. - Two approvals on every pull request before merge. Whoever can perform a merge. - Prettier extension in Vscode with single quotation. - BEM-ish for class names in SASS/CSS. - Work in separate branches; dont remove the branch after merge. - Assign yourself when working on an issue. - Use kebab-case when for branch names.
